verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5927>rise<s%> up out of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and shall be an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>flood,<s%> and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is <S%H4393>therein;<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: then the <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3213>howl.<s%>

At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8161>stamping<s%> of the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H47>strong<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> at the <S%H7494>rushing<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and at the <S%H1995>rumbling<s%> of his <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H3437>back<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H7510>feebleness<s%> of <S%H3027>hands;<s%>

<S%H5921>Because<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7703>spoil<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5826>helper<s%> that <S%H8300>remains:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7703>spoil<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H339>country<s%> of <S%H3731>Caphtor.<s%>

<S%H7144>Baldness<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> is <S%H1820>cut<s%> off with the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of their <S%H6010>valley:<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H1413>cut<s%> yourself?

O you <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> you be <S%H8252>quiet?<s%> <S%H622>put<s%> up yourself <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H8593>scabbard,<s%> <S%H7280>rest,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%>

<S%H349>How<s%> can it be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> seeing the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has given it a <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>shore?<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> has he <S%H3259>appointed<s%> it.
